simple world

A simple polygon map of world sovereign countries, a modified copy of the rnaturalearth counties110 (see data-raw/simpleworld.R for details).

Examples

anglr(simpleworld[1:10, ])
#> $o
#> # A tibble: 10 x 64
#>    scalerank featurecla  labelrank sovereignt sov_a3 adm0_dif level type  admin
#>  *     <int> <chr>           <dbl> <chr>      <chr>     <dbl> <dbl> <chr> <chr>
